trans-unit.source: How to: Create an Access Control Namespace
trans-unit.target: How to: Create an Access Control Namespace

trans-unit.source: How to: Create an Access Control Namespace
trans-unit.target: How to: Create an Access Control Namespace

trans-unit.source: ACS namespaces can migrate their Google identity provider configurations from OpenID 2.0 to OpenID Connect.
trans-unit.target: ACS namespaces can migrate their Google identity provider configurations from OpenID 2.0 to OpenID Connect.

trans-unit.source: Migration must be completed before June 1, 2015.
trans-unit.target: Migration must be completed before June 1, 2015.

trans-unit.source: For detailed guidance, see <link xlink:href="abed9a15-8466-4c3a-80e0-8fa24a3ea0f7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Migrating ACS Namespaces to Google OpenID Connect</link>.
trans-unit.target: For detailed guidance, see <link xlink:href="abed9a15-8466-4c3a-80e0-8fa24a3ea0f7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Migrating ACS Namespaces to Google OpenID Connect</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following topic explains how to create a new <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.
trans-unit.target: The following topic explains how to create a new <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.

trans-unit.source: You can create one or more <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>s in your <token>azure_1</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can create one or more <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>s in your <token>azure_1</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: Each <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> name must be globally unique so that it can be identified by the service.
trans-unit.target: Each <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> name must be globally unique so that it can be identified by the service.

trans-unit.source: You do not have to use the same name for both client and service applications.
trans-unit.target: You do not have to use the same name for both client and service applications.

trans-unit.source: The system now creates and activates your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.
trans-unit.target: The system now creates and activates your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.

trans-unit.source: You might have to wait several minutes as the system provisions resources for your account.
trans-unit.target: You might have to wait several minutes as the system provisions resources for your account.

trans-unit.source: After the namespace is created, you cannot change the namespace name or the region where the namespace is hosted.
trans-unit.target: After the namespace is created, you cannot change the namespace name or the region where the namespace is hosted.

trans-unit.source: However, you can delete the namespace and recreate it, and you can change your subscription.
trans-unit.target: However, you can delete the namespace and recreate it, and you can change your subscription.

trans-unit.source: To change a subscription, in the <token>azureportal1</token>, click <ui>Active Directory</ui>, click a namespace that is associated with the subscription that you want to change, and then click <ui>Change Subscription</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To change a subscription, in the <token>azureportal1</token>, click <ui>Active Directory</ui>, click a namespace that is associated with the subscription that you want to change, and then click <ui>Change Subscription</ui>.

trans-unit.source: The Change Subscription feature is enabled only when you have more than one subscription and you are an administrator or co-administrator of the subscription.
trans-unit.target: The Change Subscription feature is enabled only when you have more than one subscription and you are an administrator or co-administrator of the subscription.
